title: Introducing: Figures
content:
There seems to be an awful lot of awesome new music coming out of California at the moment.

With the likes of The Neighbourhood and NO leading the charge, it appears that there’s a real ambition to the Cali music scene, and Oak Park quintet Figures are no different. With their explosive yet measured debut EP, titled Monsters, they prove their worth as songwriters, capable of penning both epic, stadium ready anthems (Ghosts) and more tender, heartfelt numbers (How To Grow Old), sandwiched between lead single Stay. From Jillian Medford’s versatile vocals to the hook heavy guitar riffs, Figures are a band with a very bright future ahead of them. Check out their debut EP below.
